message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair play!
Let's be realistic, Alice. This round I get a little extra, but you still get a good deal before inflation eats away at it.
I'm willing to give you a bit more this round, Bob. But I need to get a better deal than your last offer. Let's work together.
Okay, Alice, let's meet in the middle. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure and inflation.
